comments.text:
* Filing this sooner rather than later. Will comment in the bug once we have resources and a schedule in place.

Project overview: Create an awesome welcome experience for Facebook users when visiting the Firefox page. Invite them to Like the page and also provide some quick ways to participate with Mozilla and Firefox. 

Wiki: https://wiki.mozilla.org/Engagement/Social/Facebook/Landing_tab
